title: New: Crewdson- Gravity
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Crewdson.jpg "Crewdson")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8423-new-crewdson-gravity/attachment/crewdson)

Due for release this Monday, the 20th of June, we can offer you a stream of ‘Gravity’ by the fantastic Crewdson. Released through Slowfoot Records, the record sees Hugh Jones following up his acclaimed ‘Dust EP’ with further experimentations under the post-dubstep banner. For a market saturated with various bedroom producers, this is an album which will stand out for its accessibility, whilst retaining a sense of creation and intrigue. From the minimalist glitches of ‘Dust Crawlers’ to the shaved brass of ‘To A New Day’, this is an album which is hugely danceable and yet intrinsically exploratory.

 [Crewdson – Gravity (Album)](http://soundcloud.com/crewdson/sets/crewdson-gravity-album) by [crewdson](http://soundcloud.com/crewdson)
